page.title: 09Farm Life
page.content: My dad is one of the farmers in the area. Our farm is a mixed farm which means that we grow arable crops and raise cattle for milk. My dad gets up each day at 7.00 a.m., has a cup of tea and then goes out to milk the cows who will need milking again in the middle of the afternoon. Throughout the year jobs on the farm vary but when the weather is dry he likes to work outside in the fields and when it is wet he works indoors. In January and February he ploughs the fields and in March,April and May he plants the seeds and as the crops grow he sprays them to protect them from pests and diseases. In June and into July he cuts the grass for Hay and in August the corn is cut and straw gathered in.During September and October the potatoes are harvested.My dad works very hard and we all help.
